Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: An experimental model of focal segmental glomerular sclerosis ( FSGS ) was developed in rats by the combined administration of puromycin - aminonucleoside ( AMNS ) and protamine sulfate ( PS ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| focal segmental glomerular sclerosis (FSGS) |
| puromycin-aminonucleoside (AMNS) |

The two disease entities in the paragraph are "focal segmental glomerular sclerosis (FSGS)" and "puromycin-aminonucleoside (AMNS)". FSGS is a kidney disease, while AMNS is a potential cause of kidney damage.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| focal segmental glomerular sclerosis (FSGS) |

The only clear disease entity in the paragraph is "focal segmental glomerular sclerosis (FSGS)". The other entity, "puromycin-aminonucleoside (AMNS)", is a potential cause of kidney damage, but it is not a disease itself.
